article: My Favorite Sweater by Bonnie Highsmith Taylor My favorite sweater grew too small . I love that sweater best of all . My grandma made it when I was three . She made that sweater just for me . I picked the yam , a special blue . The color of bluebells , wet with dew . When I was three I was very small . But now I ' m five and much too tall . I have a new jacket now that ' s green . So I gave my sweater to our cat Queen . Queen just had kittens out in the shed . My favorite sweater is now their bed .
questions: What do we know from the poem ?

model: the sweater is too small for the girl now .
the sweater is too big for the girl .
human: The girl does n ' t like the sweater any more .
The sweater is too small for the girl now .
